name: Maternity Heave ©
description:
Play your Trigger™ Handheld game, Ninja GuyDan™, while avoiding your Mom's household missiles and enduring her verbal assaults as she attempts to get you to stop playing those dang video games!

Maternity Heave™ is a game developed for GGJ 2019 by the Gumbo Punks team at the Playcrafting/Microsoft site in NYC.  

The Gumbo Punks are:

Adriano Valle

Roman Sharf

Jenna Dancel

Osvaldo Andreaus

Will Thompson

Lucas Edwards

Edwin Fong

Deidre Witan

GGJ 2019 Entry
